name: Susan KUROPATAWA, Petitioner, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Kuropatawa v. State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance

parties: Susan KUROPATAWA, Petitioner, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 1997, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted limited to Issue A:
Does an insured have standing to file suit against his automobile insurance carrier to compel payment of his medical bills when payment has been denied based upon a Peer Review Report requested under 75 Pa.C.S.A. § 1797(b).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
692 A.2d 1097
Susan KUROPATAWA, Petitioner, v. STATE FARM MUTUAL AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 1997.
Ross Begelman, for petitioner.
